# availableMetadataFormats

**Instance Property**

The metadata formats that contain metadata associated with the option.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableMetadataFormats: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains `NSString` objects, each representing a metadata format that contains metadata associated with the option (for example, ID3, iTunes metadata, and so on).

## Managing metadata

- **commonMetadata**: An array of metadata items for each common metadata key for which a value is available.
- **metadata(forFormat:)**: Returns an array of metadata items—one for each metadata item in the container of a given format.

items.description: An array of metadata items for each common metadata key for which a value is available.
items.name: commonMetadata
